sentences.en: Also during that year, Nino Valenti died of a cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 另外,在那一年里, 尼诺-华伦提脑溢血死了.

sentences.en: Attentions should be paid to EPS in cases with postpartum hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: EPS反应引起的产后出血值得重视.

sentences.en: Conclusion The exogenous CGRP can inhibit pulmonary hemorrhage induced by ET - 1 .
sentences.cn: 结论外源性CGRP有拮抗ET -1 致肺出血的作用.

sentences.en: He sank into a coma after suffering a brain hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 他在脑溢血后陷入了昏迷。

sentences.en: Hypertensive, cerebral hemorrhage, did department operation to return some saving?
sentences.cn: 高血压, 脑出血, 做了脑部手术还有的救 吗 ?

sentences.en: I haemorrhaged badly after the birth of all three of my sons.
sentences.cn: 我把3个儿子都生下来之后，严重内出血。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the factors influenced the prognosis of hypertensive cerebellar hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨影响高血压脑出血预后的因素.

sentences.en: Pain, infection, hemorrhage, and shock were four of the most difficult to overcome.
sentences.cn: 疼痛 、 感染 、 出血 、 休克四个问题最难克服.

sentences.en: Retinal hemorrhage, and blurring of the optic dise cause visual disturbances.
sentences.cn: 视网膜出血及神经盘模糊等可导致视力障碍.

sentences.en: Shortly after his admission into the hospital he had a massive brain haemorrhage and died.
sentences.cn: 他住进医院不久，因脑部大量内出血而去世了。

sentences.en: The complications of duodenal ulcer that require surgical management are hemorrhage , perforation, obstruction, and intractability.
sentences.cn: 十二指肠溃疡需外科治疗的并发症是出血、穿孔 、 梗阻和顽固性.

sentences.en: The man on the stretcher over me has a hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 我上边那担架上的人在流血.

sentences.en: The objective is to study the imaging features of adrenal hemorrhage in neonates.
sentences.cn: 目的是探讨新生儿肾上腺出血的影像学特征。

sentences.en: The patient died from acute cerebral hemorrhage.
The pericarditis here not only has fibrin, but also hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 图示心包炎时不但有纤维素形成, 而且还有出血.

sentences.en: These drugs will not be used if hemorrhage is the cause of the stroke.
sentences.cn: 药品禁忌症：出血性中风忌用。

sentences.en: Title: Recovery of Cognitive Function After Surgery for Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 标题: 动脉瘤性蛛网膜下腔出血术后认知功能的恢复.

trans.tran_en: A haemorrhage is serious bleeding inside a person's body
If someone is haemorrhaging, there is serious bleeding inside their body
